synopsis.text: Kazami Jun, a skilled mechanic, leads the team at Mecha Doc, a renowned car tuning shop in Tokyo. Known as the 'mechanical doctors,' they specialize in transforming ordinary vehicles into high-performance machines. Their crowning achievement is Mechadock, a formidable racing car that has evolved from a humble economy car. Capable of conquering any terrain, Mechadock is a testament to Mecha Doc's expertise. However, if you're thinking of testing your street racing skills near their headquarters, be prepared for a driving lesson from Jun himself that you won't soon forget.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
